com.turing123.robotframe.notification

Class NotificationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turing123.robotframe.notification.NotificationManager

  • public class NotificationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Notification management interface for sending/receiving. You can get the NotificationManager by calling sInstance
